Title: Denial of Service in @commercial/hapi
Description: Affected versions of `@commercial/hapi` are vulnerable to Denial of Service. The CORS request handler has a vulnerability which will cause the function to throw a system error if the header contains some invalid values. If no unhandled exception handler is available, the application will exist, allowing an attacker to shut down services.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 16.8.2, all versions starting from 17.0.0 before 17.9.2, all versions starting from 18.0.0 before 18.4.1, all versions starting from 19.0.0 before 19.1.1
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 16.8.2 before 17.0.0, all versions starting from 17.9.2 before 18.0.0, all versions starting from 18.4.1 before 19.0.0, all versions starting from 19.1.1
